mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_STATUS, ACCOUNT_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, ORGAN_A_ID, ORGAN_B_ID, PROJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PROJECT_ITEM_ID, ALIAS_ACCOUNT_NAME, CLOSE_TIME, MAIN_ACCOUNT_NO, ORGAN_A_NAME, ORGAN_B_NAME, BANK_NAME, UNION_BANK_NO, IS_LOGOUT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT (ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_STATUS, ACCOUNT_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, ORGAN_A_ID, ORGAN_B_ID, PROJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PROJECT_ITEM_ID, ALIAS_ACCOUNT_NAME, CLOSE_TIME, MAIN_ACCOUNT_NO, ORGAN_A_NAME, ORGAN_B_NAME, BANK_NAME, UNION_BANK_NO, IS_LOGOUT) values (#{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organAId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organBId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mainAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organAName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organBName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionBankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLogout,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
